NGUYEN NGOC
09 July 1988
ngngthanhmai@gmail.com
+84938613093
facebook.com/ngngthanhmai
linkedin.com/in/ngngthanhmai
THANH MAI
LIFE PHILOSOPHY
You dare to go through a hard struggle as the
spirit moves you and definitely see the light at
the end of the tunnel.
EXPERIENCE
O
MARKETING & MERCHANDISE MANAGER
Con Cung Join Stock 2017 - Present
Plan and develop merchandising strategies that balance customers'
expectations and company's objectives through analysing sales figures,
customers reactions and market trends to anticipate product needs and
plan product stock.
Maximise customer interests and sales levels by online displaying
products appropriately and produce layout plans for stores.
Forecast profits/sales and plan budgets base on monitor stock
movement and consider promotions, price changes, clearance.
Achievements
Growth 120 stores with over 1 million shoppers per month.
Keep brand's reputation and customers' trust in the media crisis
communication.
O
DIGITAL MARKETING MANAGER
California Management Group 2015 - 2017
Build plans and orientate strategies for Marketing Projects inside and
outside of CMG to achieve superior customer engagement by strategically
exploiting all aspects of the media marketing roadmap with the allocation
of marketing budget to ensure achievement profit objectives.
Create marketing programs including: establish pricing strategy,
building communication strategies, planing activations/promotions to
build category connection with consumers, forecasting and allocation of
marketing budget to ensure achievement brand profit objectives.
Co-ordinate between external partners and internal departments to
ensure the implementation of marketing activities, all aligned with the
system.I also create appropriate tracking procedures to ensure
properexecution of these activities.
Achievements
Make California Fitness & Yoga the most interested fitness brand in the
fitness industry.
Most Valuable Player prize at CMG Award 2016.
6/10 TOP content that generates the most engagement on social
media in fitness industry.
70o.0oo: new fans got in 6 months with the best cost ever.
O
DIGITAL MARKETING CONSULTANT
HD Digital Agency 2014 - 2016
Assist Digital Marketing Director with strategy and operational
decisions, whilst ofering generating marketing ideas and provide
consultancy during the client meeting.
Create and effectively disseminate digital content plans, coordinate,
implement and monitor targeted and segmented campaigns and
projects across relevant channels to promote the client's products and
services to customers.
Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships to
analyze customer needs; give the plan to approach the problem as the
premise for the meeting of ideas and digital marketing plans for clients.
Achievements
Receive satisfaction from customers who cooperated: Coke, Close up,
Hazeline, KFC, Men's Biore, Điện Quang, Aviva Vietnam, Sapporo, Head
& Shoulder, LinkedIn, Cat Tien Sa...
50%: the growth rate of Galaxy Cinema revenue from social media with
my strategic and operation content role.
O
SENIOR MARKETING
VNG Corporation 2011 - 2015
Be responsible for the ativities of the MKT online products including:
paid media (banner ads, GDN, SEM), PR, Social media, promotions,. to
ensure the objectives of branding, new user, revenue, churn user, ..
Provide pr
E
0
MOST PROUD OF
all
Con Cung's growth
from 280 stores to 400 stores with over a
million shopper per month

at California Management Group
l

most interested fitness brand
Leading in the fitness industry and
Facebook honours Success Story to
inspire marketer
LF]
Vietnam Record
certificated by Organization Vietnam
Guinness for the map of Vietnam with the
most representative images
e
10 years experience in marketing
through strategy building and
implementing plans for 52 campaigns
STRENGTHS
Business Strategy)
Project Management)
(ogical Thinking )Data Analysis )
Marketing)
Positive Attitude) (Taking Responsibility)
(CFlexibility)
(Assertiveness )
CCreativity)
(Self-Control )
A
HOBBIES AND INTERESTS
1
RUNNING
join Dalat Ultra Trail, Dragon Dash, 42race
L
CLIMBING & ADVENTURE TRAVEL
conquer Fansipan, Ba Den and discover
Tu Lan Caves System
Q
TAKE CARE FAMILY
happily married and has one daughter
n
ENTERTAINMENT
Movie, Music, Photography
i
relevant content production and promotion, including website, key
visual, content, technical and policy literature.
Create and effectively disseminate digital content (graphics, videos)
across various internal and external channels in supporting of above
and below the line.
Achievements
Manage the 2nd biggest social network with more than 4 million users.
1 Vietnamese record: "Online Map have attached most photo profile" is
certificated by Organization Vietnam Guinness.
3 online games (Include Gunny, Boom, Wartune): manage all activities of
the MKT online and get more 1 million users per month for each product.
10.000 participants: implement the marketing communication for the
event"Dai Hoi Lau Hanh" in 12/2014, this is the ofline event that
atracted the most participants in the field of online games in Vietnam at
the moment there.
85o.00: organize and operate 1 of the 2 largest fan page in the field of
online game.
EDUCATION
MBA of Business Administration at Ho Chi
Business Training & Digital Marketing at BMG
International Education
Engineers of Information Technology at Hong
Bang International University
O
WEBMASTER
Hoang Quan Corporation Limited 2009 - 2011
Maintain websites and servers to meet user needs, take responsibility
for making site easy to use, atractive and secure.
Work closely with colleagues and external stakeholders to assess website
effectiveness and identify opportunities for continuous improvement.
